name: Study in Color #1
description:
The first installment in the Triptych Generative Color Exploration series.
This piece was inspired by Clay Heaton's Tilero (OBJKT#300791), and further explores the concept of colors and moving tiles. This idea was then deconstructed and expanded upon to create the series.

(Click to play/pause the piece, and press the R Key to randomize the canvas)
